user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my sister's engagement and I want to make it memorable. Fetch me a love calculator API to create a personalized message for the couple. Also, provide me with a chuck norris jokes API to add laughter to the celebration.

TaskList.description: Fetch love calculator API to generate a personalized message based on the couple's names.
Fetch Chuck Norris jokes API to retrieve a random joke for the celebration.
Combine the personalized message and the joke for the party decorations or cards.
